name: The Peak (MiguelCPereira)
description:
Explore the tricky mountains with your trusty flag collection!

The Peak is a short puzzle-platformer, which combines resource management/crafting and retro-style platforming.

Collect minerals, craft flags and swing across the mountains to your heart's contempt - but be careful not to fall!

Up is the always the way.

This game was fully developed by me, Miguel Pereira, but multiple free assets were used in the process which deserve their due credit.

Protagonist Spritesheet : Free Game Assets

Environment Sprites : Aamatniekss

Cursor : Kicked in Teeth

Input Icons : Kadith

Menu Song : Lost Worlds - Ketsa

Main Level Song : Snowfall - Shady Dave

Other Audio Assets : Freesound
